collectible.title: Picture of The Four Horsemen
collectible.subtitle: What a lovely and disfunctional family.
collectible.text: From left to right, Pestilence, Famine, Death, and War. For as long as humanity has existed, these four have roamed the earth as a reminder of how fragile life is. While they used to play a more active role in causing havoc, nowadays they just sort of dick around while the stupid humans do their work for them.
